alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 3:14PM EST until February 27 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... West Virginia... Ohio River At Belleville Lock affecting Meigs, Wood and Jackson Counties. For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River At Belleville Lock. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Ohio State Route 124 is flooded north of Stiversville Road, at Rock Run, at Wells Run to Smith Ridge to Dewitts Run, at Forked Run, at Curtis Hollow Road and between Long Bottom and Shade River. Ohio State Route 124 near the Washington and Meigs County line is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 34.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 35.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.0 feet on 02/27/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM EST.
